titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2266) making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1998, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-267, by Mr. Goss.

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 2266. The resolution waives all points of order against the conference report and against its consideration. The conference report shall be considered as read when called up.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 96.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 419 - 3 (Roll no. 441).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/24/1997--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2266 (defense appropriations).
